preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 6.5 g of Arsenic Trioxide (As2O3). 
 2. Weigh out 15.2 g of Barium Carbonate (BaCO3). 
 3. Weigh out 10.0 g of Silicon Dioxide (SiO2). 
 4. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine all three powders thoroughly using a spatula or a mortar and pestle until a uniform mix is achieved.
